languages.text: Ксеносы разбиты, и ваши люди высаживаются на вражеский корабль, прорезая путь через переборки к источнику сигнала. Они находят истлевшие останки абордажной группы фон Валанциус — один из трупов сжимает вокс-передатчик, вещающий в пустоту голосами мертвецов. Все они пали много десятилетий назад.

The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.
languages.original_text: Ксеносы разбиты, и ваши люди высаживаются на вражеский корабль, прорезая путь через переборки к источнику сигнала. Они находят истлевшие останки абордажной группы фон Валанциус — один из трупов сжимает вокс-передатчик, вещающий в пустоту голосами мертвецов. Все они пали много десятилетий назад.

traits.locale_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, broadcasting the voices of the dead into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, broadcasting the voices of the dead into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, broadcasting the voices of the dead into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, broadcasting the voices of the dead into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

languages.text: Die Xenos sind besiegt und deine Männer bahnen sich auf dem feindlichen Schiff einen Weg zum Ursprung des Signals. Sie finden die verwesten Leichen eines Enterkommandos derer von Valancius. Einer der Toten umklammert einen Vox-Transmitter und sendet die Stimmen der Toten in die Leere. Sie sind alle vor vielen Jahrzehnten gestorben.
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

traits.locale_text: Die Xenos sind besiegt und deine Männer bahnen sich auf dem feindlichen Schiff einen Weg zum Ursprung des Signals. Sie finden die verwesten Leichen eines Enterkommandos derer von Valancius. Einer der Toten umklammert einen Vox-Transmitter und sendet die Stimmen der Toten in die Leere. Sie sind alle vor vielen Jahrzehnten gestorben.

languages.text: Les xénos vaincus, vos hommes abordent le vaisseau ennemi dont ils découpent les cloisons pour atteindre la source du signal. Une fois arrivés à destination, ils découvrent les cadavres d'un groupe d'abordage des von Valancius. L'un des cadavres tient dans sa main un émetteur vox projetant les voix des défunts dans l'espace intersidéral. Tous sont morts il y a plusieurs décennies de cela.
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos vaincus, vos hommes abordent le vaisseau ennemi dont ils découpent les cloisons pour atteindre la source du signal. Une fois arrivés à destination, ils découvrent les cadavres d'un groupe d'abordage des von Valancius. L'un des cadavres tient dans sa main un émetteur-vox projetant les voix des défunts dans l'espace intersidéral. Tous sont morts il y a plusieurs décennies de cela.

languages.text: Los xenos han sido vencidos y tu gente aborda la nave enemiga, atravesando las mamparas hasta llegar al origen de la señal. Encuentran los restos descompuestos de un grupo de abordaje von Valancius. Uno de los cadáveres sujeta un voco amplificador, que envía las voces de los muertos al vacío. Todos ellos murieron hace décadas.
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos han sido vencidos y tu gente aborda la nave enemiga, atravesando las mamparas hasta llegar al origen de la señal. Encuentran los restos descompuestos de un grupo de abordaje von Valancius. Uno de los cadáveres sujeta un voco amplificador, que envía las voces de los muertos al vacío. Todos ellos murieron hace décadas.

languages.text: 異種族どもは敗れ、あなたの部下は敵艦に乗り込み、隔壁を切り裂いて信号の発信源へと向かった。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウスの乗り込み部隊の朽ち果てた亡骸を見つけた。死体の一人が音声通信送受信装置を握りしめており、死者の声を虚空へと送り出している。彼らは全員、何十年も前に斃れていたのだ。
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

traits.locale_text: 異種族どもは敗れ、あなたの部下は敵艦に乗り込み、隔壁を切り裂いて信号の発信源へと向かった。彼らはフォン・ヴァランシウスの乗り込み部隊の朽ち果てた亡骸を見つけた。死体の一人が音声通信送受信装置を握りしめており、死者の声を虚空へと送り出している。彼らは全員、何十年も前に斃れていたのだ。

languages.text: 你们消灭了异形。你的人登上了敌舰，最终在某个船舱里找到了信号源。信号源来自冯·瓦兰修斯王朝登舰队的残骸，其中一具尸体死死地抓着通讯器，将死者们的声音发送到虚空之中。这些人早在几十年前就已经死了。
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.

traits.locale_text: 你们消灭了异形。你的人登上了敌舰，最终在某个船舱里找到了信号源。信号源来自冯·瓦兰修斯王朝登舰队的残骸，其中一具尸体死死地抓着通讯器，将死者们的声音发送到虚空之中。这些人早在几十年前就已经死了。

languages.text: Zenolar alt edildi. Askerlerin, düşman gemisine girerek sinyalin kaynağına doğru bölme panellerini kesip biçerek ilerliyor. Von Valancius bordalama ekibinin çürümüş kalıntılarını buluyorlar. Voksyayarını sıkı sıkıya kavrayan cesetlerden biri, ölülerin seslerini uçsuzun dört bir yanına gönderiyor. Hepsi, onlarca yıl önce can vermiş.
languages.original_text: The xenos are defeated, and your men board the enemy ship, cutting their way through the bulkheads to the source of the signal. They find the decayed remains of a von Valancius boarding party. One of the corpses is clutching a vox-caster, sending the voices of the dead out into the void. All of them fell many decades ago.
